name: 蔡銘修
objective: This course aims to study the peculiarity, scope, theories, and research methodology on learning psychology. Topics include behavioral approaches, cognitive approaches and other related theories, types of learning, and applications of learning theories.
schedule:
01 2/22 Course introduction and description, overall overview of learning psychology
02 3/01 The physiological mechanism of learning (1): Brain and Learning
03 3/08 The physiological mechanism of learning (2): Cognitive Neuroscience-Attention
04 3/15 The Physiological Mechanism of Learning (3): Cognitive Neuroscience-Perception
05 3/22 School sports day: Asynchronous online class
The Physiological Mechanism of Learning (4): Cognitive Neuroscience-Memory
06 3/29 TVET Conference-No class
07 4/05 No class
08 4/12 The Theory of Constraining Learning: Behaviorism
09 4/19 Synchronous online class: google meet
The Theory of Constraining Learning: Behaviorism2
10 4/26 Bandura Social Learning Theory
11 5/03 Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs & Milgram Obedience to Authority experiment
12 5/10 Cognitive Constructivism & Social Constructivism
13 5/17 Cooperative Learning & Problem Based Learning in Constructivism
14 5/24 Comparison of Behavioral, Cognitive, Developmental, Social Cognitive & Constructivist Perspectives
15 5/31 Motivation Theory
16 6/07 Final Presentation 1
17 6/14 Final Presentation 2
18 6/21 Final week
scorePolicy:
Attendance 10%
Classroom Participation 20% 
Class Assignment 40%(Please Join google classroom "xtzvijn" for week's assignments)
Final presentation and report 30%
